name: chicagotribune
text:
The FDA will work with Pfizer to revise fact sheets and prescribing information for the vaccine so that the public would understand the risk of allergic reactions and know how to report them.

From The New York Times https://t.co/lCiHICL6ho

name: chicagotribune
text: “I’m very optimistic that this vaccine is truly a light at the end of what has been a long, dark tunnel for us." https://t.co/V39CPio6v7
